long_description: The Pacsafe RFIDtec 250 is a well-thought-out, lightweight travel wallet and an ideal everyday wallet. Store cards, money and even a passport when you travel. Different sections are perfect for separating currencies, and the transparent coin pocket helps you find the right change when you need it. RFID-reader-blocking pocket prevents access to your personal data stored on micro chips in your passport and credit cards. Pacsafe RFIDtec 250 has a transparent zip pocket, 2 slip-in pockets for cash, 8 credit card slots, a slip-in passport pocket and an outer zip coin pocket.
short_description: The Pacsafe RFIDtec 250 is a well-thought-out, lightweight travel wallet and an ideal everyday wallet. Store cards, money and even a passport when you travel.
